website_summaries.verdict: Stylish duffel bag that doesn't look anything like a diaper bag and has several pockets.
pros: Includes a high level of insulation to keep any milk fresh
Plenty of extra pockets so you can organize and store all of your gear properly
Adjustable shoulder strap will make it easier for you to carry the bag comfortably, even when it has a lot of gear inside it
cons: A little smaller than some other duffel-style diaper bags

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking bag but its more on the thin side ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my brother-in-law mainly . It's a nice looking bag but its more on the thin side but it looks as though its sturdy. The strap is nice and thick. The inside is fairly roomy. The quality is great. It will be a great man diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient especially for moms on the go
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my sister's first baby. She loves it! A couple of the things she mentioned to me that she loves are the insulated bottle pocket, and that it came with a changing mat. Super convenient especially for moms on the go. Plus, she said it is nice because she can use it and look fashionable, and her husband can too without it being too girly looking for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Lots of pockets to keep all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Lots of pockets to keep all the baby gear sorted. Still stylish if you're not into the girly, bulky bags. Could see myself using this as a travel bag after my daughter grows up.
customer_reviews.author: Ly T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my niece and nephew on the event of the birth of a second child. It was far more accommodating than the Diaper bag I had given for the first baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fitton

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Diaper bag a guy can carry that’s not too over-the-top. Changing pad is great. Bag holds everything I need for the tater tot with room to spare. Thought this would be a backup bag but it ended up being the one in heavy rotation.
customer_reviews.author: W. Breedlove III

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty ugly green (not as dark or muted as the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty ugly green (not as dark or muted as the picture indicates. It's more bright than it appears), but it's by far the best diaper bag we've had to date. I just wish it came in different colors. Or maybe just not Sick Alligator Green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for husband to carry
customer_reviews.text: My husband will be the primary caregiver of our baby girl after I return to work. I wanted something that my husband could wear comfortably. This bag is well made, fits every thing we need, and looks good on him.
customer_reviews.author: genetic mutation

customer_reviews.title: Her boy friend Harlan said that the Duffel Diaper Bag was the best gift that they received at the Baby Shower
customer_reviews.text: My daughter Julia had a baby shower on August 27, 2017. Her boy friend Harlan said that the Duffel Diaper Bag was the best gift that they received at the Baby Shower. Harlan likes the color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Gobert

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because of the brand, I was looking for good quality but only time wolud proove that so I will update this review in a few months. It looks good for now. It is smaller than I expected so I don't know if It would be a bad thing (my baby doesn't born yet) The changing mat is much more smaller, it has space just for a newborn baby, like 3 month or less (in the photo I put a Sharpie to compare) But I like that it is very light and a neutral type bag, so my husband can used it and it doesn't seems like a diperbag.
customer_reviews.author: María de los Ángeles

customer_reviews.title: Roomy bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, lots of room for everything a baby needs. It's also a good color for my husband to carry to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the price. Understated looks. Can be packed slim or full as necessary. The insulated pocket for bottles is helpful. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FlyDJ5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for a toddler. Bag is not too big or small and thr design is great for dads as its not girly. As far as space and design, it fits a few changes of clothes, wipes, diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Mcfly1982

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: We love this bag! It's lightweight and has a bunch of space.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space and compartments for all of my son's stuff and mine too! Also, Daddy has no qualms about carrying this diaper bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: savanna

customer_reviews.title: they absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a young couple getting ready to have their first baby. they absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Redden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, color and most of all the durability of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband and we both love it
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag is lightweight with lots of pockets for various items such as clothes, diapers, wipes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Good size, not flashy
customer_reviews.text: It's a diaper bag. Child's changing mat has a few flap pouches for things on the other side. Good size, not flashy, great for the dad-on-the-go, and since it's close enough to "olive drab" it's even usable in uniform, military dads (depending on your service's regs, green light for Air Force).
customer_reviews.author: McDonald, Kindle User

customer_reviews.title: But I thought it looked like a nice size and quality bag with lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, not for me. But I thought it looked like a nice size and quality bag with lots of handy pockets.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The compartments are useful and the changing mat is essential
customer_reviews.text: Duffle diaper bag was just as advertised. The compartments are useful and the changing mat is essential!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the rugged mom
customer_reviews.text: I needed a diaper bag that was large enough for everything I needed for overnights, that was sturdy and tough, and not overly feminine. This bag did all that, and more! I love all of the compartments, both zippered and pocket. The bottle cooler pocket keeps cold for hours, and is very easy to clean. I couldn't be happier! This was purchased off my registry.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Falco

customer_reviews.title: Best gift at baby shower.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased this for my niece and gifted her with it at her baby shower full of baby items. It was a big hit. Now she is expecting her first child, my first grandchild so I sent her one and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: Columbia Expedition Ridge Duffel Diaper Bag, Green
product_meta.description: Columbia Expedition Ridge Duffle Diaper Bag - Green. Carry your baby's diapers and supplies in style with the Columbia Expedition Ridge Duffle Diaper Bag. Along with an adjustable shoulder strap and pad for comfy transport, this bag also features a zippered main compartment with interior pockets, three front pockets, two side pockets and a large zippered back pocket that holds the included changing pad and messy bag. The integrated bottle pocket has high-density insulation and a Therma-Flect radiant barrier to help baby's milk stay fresh. Lean only. The adjustable permanent shoulder strap is padded to help make carrying comfortable. An included padded changing pad and messy bag help you stay prepared for diaper changes while out and about. Store necessities you want to be able to grab easily in the front panel's three zippered pockets or the two elasticized exterior side pockets.
feature_bullets: Integrated bottle pocket with high density insulation and a Therma-Flect radiant barrier to help milk or formula stay fresh
Three fully lined and zippered pockets in the front panel for easy access to necessities
Large zippered back pocket for the included padded changing mat and messy bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
